data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample SARUJUPI-322

Exposition SE, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Silikat-Hangschutt, Feiner, Tree line 1400 m, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 15%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 1%, Vegatation type: Sehr trockener Fö-Wald angrenzend a Step, Film number: 1099C
